name: Demolitionreport
tagline: DemolitionReport is a java library designed for logging while the jvm is in the process of shutting down.
body:
### What is DemolitionReport
DemolitionReport is a java library created to help debug production crash scenarios. Using DepolitionReport you can set up a series of series of reports containing key metrics from inside and outside the jvm. These reports can be sceduled to run onStartup, every n seconds or during the jvm shutdown process. 

It is designed as a low impact tool to safely run beside production applications.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
